item.content:encoded: A letter John Lennon wrote to Paul McCartney and his late wife Linda will be up for auction and is expected to sell for about $60700 (£40000) NME reports Written in 1971 in the wake of the Beatles' break-up the letter will be up for sale on May 30th as part of an...

item.content:encoded: English actor Richard Griffiths who played Vernon Dursley in the Harry Potter film series died unexpectedly from complications following heart surgery according to The Hollywood Reporter He was 65 Along with playing Potter's curmudgeonly muggle guardian Griffiths became a cult favorite in the UK after portraying Uncle Monty in the 1987 comedy...
